sentences.sContent: Barnet was desperate for money to resolve his financial problems.
sentences.sCn: 巴尼特急需钱来解决他的经济问题。

sentences.sContent: ...whereas women may approach the same dispute from the perspective of what's the easiest and quickest way to resolve the problem-even if that means doing the boring work themselves...
...But chances are it won’t have much impact on the human tendency to resolve to get to the gym more and avoid chocolate cake when the clock strikes midnight on December 31...

synos.tran: 决定；溶解；使…分解；决心要做…

words.tran: 下定决心的；已解决的；断然的
可分解的；可解决的；可溶解的
分解的；有溶解力的；消散的
[物] 分辨率；决议；解决；决心
解决；决定；分解；转变（resolve的过去分词）
分辨（resolve的ing形式）；分解；决定；解决矛盾

trans.tranCn: 解决， 解答； 决定， 决意
trans.tranOther: to find a satisfactory way of dealing with a problem or difficulty
